statements: DELETE FROM curriculum_content WHERE author = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM curriculum_content WHERE author = 'John Doe' AND content_type = 'Video';
DELETE FROM lesson_plans WHERE course_id = 101 AND lesson_order = 2;
DELETE FROM lesson_plans WHERE course_id = 101 AND lesson_order < 5;
DELETE FROM curriculum_content WHERE title = 'Sample Title';
DELETE FROM curriculum_content WHERE id = 1 AND title = 'Introduction';
DELETE FROM curriculum_content WHERE content_url LIKE '%video%' OR description = 'Advanced Topic';
DELETE FROM lesson_plans WHERE title = 'Introduction to Math';
